title.rendered: The Wild, the Innocent, and the E Street Shuffle

<title>The Wild, the Innocent, and the E Street Shuffle | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Filled with iconic characters such as Rosalita and Sandy, hoodlums, fortune tellers, and sprawling narratives that fall somewhere between historical fact and tall tale, Springsteen's sophomore effort is nothing less than the sound of summer on the Jersey boardwalk." />
